languages.text: На секунду мостик окутывает напряженная тишина... А затем безумцы взрываются очередным приступом психоза. Сквозь шум слышны приказы офицеров — казнить всех!

traits.locale_text: На секунду мостик окутывает напряженная тишина... А затем безумцы взрываются очередным приступом психоза. Сквозь шум слышны приказы офицеров — казнить всех!

languages.text: For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. The officers' orders break through the cacophony — execute them all!
languages.original_text: На секунду мостик окутывает напряженная тишина... А затем безумцы взрываются очередным приступом психоза. Сквозь шум слышны приказы офицеров — казнить всех!

traits.locale_text: For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. Through the noise, an order from the officers — execute all!
For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. Through the noise, an order from the officers — execute all!
For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. The officers' orders break through the cacophony — execute them all!
For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. The officers' orders break through the cacophony — execute them all!
For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. The officers' orders break through the cacophony — execute them all!

languages.text: Por un momento, un tenso silencio cubre el puente. Pero los lunáticos pronto son presa de otro arrebato de ira. Las órdenes de los oficiales logran atravesar la cacofonía: «¡ejecutadlos a todos!».
languages.original_text: For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. The officers' orders break through the cacophony — execute them all!

traits.locale_text: Por un momento, un tenso silencio cubre el puente. Pero los lunáticos pronto son presa de otro arrebato de ira. Las órdenes de los oficiales logran atravesar la cacofonía: «¡ejecutadlos a todos!».

languages.text: 一时间，整个舰桥笼罩在紧张的沉默之中，但随后，那群疯子就被突如其来的愤怒所感染。他们嘈杂的声音被军官们发号施令的声音盖过——将这群人统统处决！
languages.original_text: For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. The officers' orders break through the cacophony — execute them all!

traits.locale_text: 一时间，整个舰桥笼罩在紧张的沉默之中，但随后，那群疯子就被突如其来的愤怒所感染。他们嘈杂的声音被军官们发号施令的声音盖过——将这群人统统处决！

languages.text: 一瞬、緊張を帯びた沈黙がブリッジに立ち込める。しかしその後、狂人達は再び怒りに襲われた。士官達の命令が不協和音を打ち破る―全員処刑せよ！
languages.original_text: For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. The officers' orders break through the cacophony — execute them all!

traits.locale_text: 一瞬、緊張を帯びた沈黙がブリッジに立ち込める。しかしその後、狂人達は再び怒りに襲われた。士官達の命令が不協和音を打ち破る―全員処刑せよ！

languages.text: Für einen Moment herrscht auf der Brücke eine angespannte Stille. Dann verfallen die Wahnsinnigen jedoch in einen weiteren Wutanfall. Die Befehle der Offiziere übertönen die Kakofonie ... alle exekutieren!
languages.original_text: For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. The officers' orders break through the cacophony — execute them all!

traits.locale_text: Für einen Moment herrscht auf der Brücke eine angespannte Stille. Dann verfallen die Wahnsinnigen jedoch in einen weiteren Wutanfall. Die Befehle der Offiziere übertönen die Kakofonie ... alle exekutieren!

languages.text: Un silence tendu retombe sur le pont, mais l'accalmie est de courte durée. Soudain, les forcenés sont pris d'un nouvel accès de rage. Les ordres des officiers retentissent par-dessus la cacophonie : exécutez-les tous !
languages.original_text: For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. The officers' orders break through the cacophony — execute them all!

traits.locale_text: Un silence tendu retombe sur le pont, mais l'accalmie est de courte durée. Soudain, les forcenés sont pris d'un nouvel accès de rage. Les ordres des officiers retentissent par-dessus la cacophonie : exécutez-les tous !

languages.text: Köprüye bir süre gergin bir sessizlik çöküyor. Sonrasında deliler bir öfke krizine daha giriyor. Subayların emirleri, kakofoniyi kırıyor... Hepsini idam edin!
languages.original_text: For a moment, tense silence falls over the bridge. But then the lunatics are stricken with another fit of rage. The officers' orders break through the cacophony — execute them all!

traits.locale_text: Köprüye bir süre gergin bir sessizlik çöküyor. Sonrasında deliler bir öfke krizine daha giriyor. Subayların emirleri, kakofoniyi kırıyor... Hepsini idam edin!
